rules_text: Create a Leading Role token attached to target creature you control. Up to one other target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.)[/i]
flavor_text:
